name: Loopy Glitch
description:
Loopy Glitch is a puzzle game in which you'll have to help Loopy escape from an endless loop. 

Made in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 47, which theme was "Stuck on a Loop"

Rules

The rules are very simple: Each level runs on a timer, and you'll have to reach the Glitch in order to escape the loop. If you don't, it will restart and you will play again, but your past loop will replay and interact with the world just as you did. Use this to your advantage and cooperate with yourself, to finally help Loopy escape.

Controls

You can run around the level by using the ARROW KEYS . Use Z to interact with the world (by picking up/placing bombs or moving boxes) and X to throw away what you're carrying.

Music:

The music consists on a loop made from a portion the original track called "Journey Onward" by Ilario Sorace (ADAD)

Link: https://soundcloud.com/adrop_aday/journey-onward
